title: 新约 - 约翰福音(John) - 第 4 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 约翰福音(John) -- 第 4 章 ( 本篇共有 21 章 )

lineList.en: When therefore the LORD knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John,
lineList.cn: 主知道法利赛人听见他收门徒施洗比约翰还多，

lineList.en: (Though Jesus himself baptized not, but his disciples,)
lineList.cn: （其实不是耶稣亲自施洗，乃是他的门徒施洗）

lineList.en: He left Judaea, and departed again into Galilee.
lineList.cn: 他就离了犹太，又往加利利去。

lineList.en: And he must needs go through Samaria.
lineList.cn: 必须经过撒玛利亚。

lineList.en: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria, which is called Sychar, near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph.
lineList.cn: 于是到了撒玛利亚的一座城，名叫叙加，靠近雅各给他儿子约瑟的那块地。

lineList.en: Now Jacob's well was there. Jesus therefore, being wearied with his journey, sat thus on the well: and it was about the sixth hour.
lineList.cn: 在那里有雅各井。耶稣因走路困乏，就坐在井旁。那时约有午正。

lineList.en: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water: Jesus saith unto her, Give me to drink.
lineList.cn: 有一个撒玛利亚的妇人来打水。耶稣对他说，请你给我水喝。

lineList.en: (For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat.)
lineList.cn: 那时门徒进城买食物去了。

lineList.en: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him, How is it that thou, being a Jew, askest drink of me, which am a woman of Samaria? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans.
lineList.cn: 撒玛利亚的妇人对他说，你既是犹太人，怎吗向我一个撒玛列亚妇人要水喝呢。原来犹太人和撒玛利亚人没有来往。

lineList.en: Jesus answered and said unto her, If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.
lineList.cn: 耶稣回答说，你若知道神的恩赐，和对你说给我水喝的是谁，你必早求他，他也必早给了你活水。

lineList.en: The woman saith unto him, Sir, thou hast nothing to draw with, and the well is deep: from whence then hast thou that living water?
lineList.cn: 妇人说，先生没有打水的器具，井又深，你从那里得活水呢。

lineList.en: Art thou greater than our father Jacob, which gave us the well, and drank thereof himself, and his children, and his cattle?
lineList.cn: 我们的祖宗雅各，将这井留给我们。他自己和儿子并牲畜，也都喝这井里的水，难道你比他还大吗。

lineList.en: Jesus answered and said unto her, Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again:
lineList.cn: 耶稣回答说，凡喝这水的，还要再渴。

lineList.en: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.
lineList.cn: 人若喝我所赐的水就永远不渴。我所赐的水，要在他里头成为泉源，直涌到永生。

lineList.en: The woman saith unto him, Sir, give me this water, that I thirst not, neither come hither to draw.
lineList.cn: 妇人说，先生，请把这水赐给我，叫我不渴，也不用来这吗远打水。

lineList.en: Jesus saith unto her, Go, call thy husband, and come hither.
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，你去叫你丈夫也到这里来。

lineList.en: The woman answered and said, I have no husband. Jesus said unto her, Thou hast well said, I have no husband:
lineList.cn: 妇人说，我没有丈夫。耶稣说，你说没有丈夫，是不错的。

lineList.en: For thou hast had five husbands; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband: in that saidst thou truly.
lineList.cn: 你已经有五个丈夫。你现在有的，并不是你的丈夫。你这话是真的。

lineList.en: The woman saith unto him, Sir, I perceive that thou art a prophet.
lineList.cn: 妇人说，先生，我看出你是先知。

lineList.en: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain; and ye say, that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship.
lineList.cn: 我们的祖宗在这山上礼拜。你们倒说，应当礼拜的地方是在耶路撒冷。

lineList.en: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, believe me, the hour cometh, when ye shall neither in this mountain, nor yet at Jerusalem, worship the Father.
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，妇人，你当信我，时候将到，你们拜父，也不在这山上，也不在耶路撒冷。

lineList.en: Ye worship ye know not what: we know what we worship: for salvation is of the Jews.
lineList.cn: 你们所拜的，你们不知道。我们所拜的，我们知道。因为救恩是从犹太人出来的。

lineList.en: But the hour cometh, and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him.
lineList.cn: 时候将到，如今就是了，那真正拜父的，

lineList.en: God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.
lineList.cn: 神是个灵（或无个字）所以拜他的，必须用心灵和诚实拜他。

lineList.en: The woman saith unto him, I know that Messias cometh, which is called Christ: when he is come, he will tell us all things.
lineList.cn: 妇人说，我知道弥赛亚，（就是那称为基督的）要来。他来了，必将一切的事都告诉我们。

lineList.en: Jesus saith unto her, I that speak unto thee am he.
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，这和你说话的就是他。

lineList.en: And upon this came his disciples, and marvelled that he talked with the woman: yet no man said, What seekest thou? or, Why talkest thou with her?
lineList.cn: 当下门徒回来，就希奇耶稣和一个妇人说话。只是没有人说，你是要什么。或说，你为什么和他说话。

lineList.en: The woman then left her waterpot, and went her way into the city, and saith to the men,
lineList.cn: 那妇人就留下水罐子，往城里去，对众人说，

lineList.en: Come, see a man, which told me all things that ever I did: is not this the Christ?
lineList.cn: 你们来看，有一个人将我素来所行的一切事，都给我说出来了，莫非这就是基督吗。

lineList.en: Then they went out of the city, and came unto him.
lineList.cn: 众人就出城往耶稣那里去。

lineList.en: In the mean while his disciples prayed him, saying, Master, eat.
lineList.cn: 这其间，门徒对耶稣说，拉比请吃。

lineList.en: But he said unto them, I have meat to eat that ye know not of.
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，我有食物吃，是你们不知道的。

lineList.en: Therefore said the disciples one to another, Hath any man brought him ought to eat?
lineList.cn: 门徒就彼此对问说，莫非有人拿什么给他吃吗。

lineList.en: Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，我的食物，就是遵行差我来者的旨意，作成他的工。

lineList.en: Say not ye, There are yet four months, and then cometh harvest? behold, I say unto you, Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.
lineList.cn: 你们岂不说，到收割的时候，还有四个月吗。我告诉你们，举目向田观看，庄稼已经熟了，（原文作发白）可以收割了。

lineList.en: And he that reapeth receiveth wages, and gathereth fruit unto life eternal: that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together.
lineList.cn: 收割的人得工价，积畜五谷到永生。叫撒种的和收割的一同快乐。

lineList.en: And herein is that saying true, One soweth, and another reapeth.
lineList.cn: 俗语说，那人撒种，这人收割，这话可见是真的。

lineList.en: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour: other men laboured, and ye are entered into their labours.
lineList.cn: 我差你们去收你们所没有劳苦的。别人劳苦，你们享受他们所劳苦的。

lineList.en: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman, which testified, He told me all that ever I did.
lineList.cn: 那城里有好些撒玛利亚人信了耶稣，因为那妇人作见证说，他将我素来所行的一切事，都给我说出来了。

lineList.en: So when the Samaritans were come unto him, they besought him that he would tarry with them: and he abode there two days.
lineList.cn: 于是撒玛利亚人来见耶稣，求他在他们那里住下。他便在那里住了两天。

lineList.en: And many more believed because of his own word;
lineList.cn: 因耶稣的话，信的人就更多了。

lineList.en: And said unto the woman, Now we believe, not because of thy saying: for we have heard him ourselves, and know that this is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world.
lineList.cn: 便对妇人说，现在我们信，不是因为你的话，是我们亲自见了，知道这真是救世主。

lineList.en: Now after two days he departed thence, and went into Galilee.
lineList.cn: 过了那两天，耶稣离了那地方，往加利利去。

lineList.en: For Jesus himself testified, that a prophet hath no honour in his own country.
lineList.cn: 因为耶稣自己作见证说，先知在本地是没有人尊敬的。

lineList.en: Then when he was come into Galilee, the Galilaeans received him, having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast: for they also went unto the feast.
lineList.cn: 到了加利利，加利利人既然看见他在耶路撒冷过节所行的一切事，就接待他。因为他们也是上去过节。

lineList.en: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee, where he made the water wine. And there was a certain nobleman, whose son was sick at Capernaum.
lineList.cn: 耶稣又到了加利利的迦拿，就是他从前变水为酒的地方。有一个大臣，他的儿子在迦百农患病。

lineList.en: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee, he went unto him, and besought him that he would come down, and heal his son: for he was at the point of death.
lineList.cn: 他听见耶稣从犹太到了加利利，就来见他，求他下去医治他的儿子。因为他儿子快要死了。

lineList.en: Then said Jesus unto him, Except ye see signs and wonders, ye will not believe.
lineList.cn: 耶稣就对他说，若不看见神迹奇事，你们总是不信。

lineList.en: The nobleman saith unto him, Sir, come down ere my child die.
lineList.cn: 那大臣说，先生，求你趁着我的孩子还没有死，就下去。

lineList.en: Jesus saith unto him, Go thy way; thy son liveth. And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him, and he went his way.
lineList.cn: 耶稣对他说，回去吧。你的儿子活了。那人信耶稣所说的话，就回去了。

lineList.en: And as he was now going down, his servants met him, and told him, saying, Thy son liveth.
lineList.cn: 正下去的时候，他的仆人迎见他，说，他的儿子活了。

lineList.en: Then enquired he of them the hour when he began to amend. And they said unto him, Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him.
lineList.cn: 他就问什么时候见好的。他们说，昨日未时热就退了。

lineList.en: So the father knew that it was at the same hour, in the which Jesus said unto him, Thy son liveth: and himself believed, and his whole house.
lineList.cn: 他便知道这正是耶稣对他说，你的儿子活了的时候，他自己全家就都信了。

lineList.en: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did, when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee.
lineList.cn: 这是耶稣在加利利行的第二件神迹，是他从犹太回去以后行的。
